headline: Stock Market Correction: 3 Top Vanguard ETFs to Buy to Help Protect Your Portfolio from Volatility
summary: The stock market recently entered a correction phase, which is a decline of 10% or more from the recent peak.  Stock market volatility can be unnerving.  While investors can't completely insulate their portfolio from volatility, they can take steps to lessen the blow.
